DOC.brief_summary: In present study investigator evaluate sensitivity specificity passive tilt test athlete , well haemodynamic response autonomic nervous system activity head-up tilt . Moreover , investigator try apply novel algorithm improvement diagnostic yield tilt test athlete .
DOC.brief_title: The Diagnostic Performance Tilt Test Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: We examine athlete history reflex syncope athlete without history reflex syncope.All subject undergo tilt test , evaluation haemodynamics , heart rate variability ( HRV ) baroreflex sensitivity .
DOC.criteria: 1440 year old , 5 year exercise train experience competition regional level different sport smoking , recent alcohol consumption , presence chronic disease use drug
